title: "Artificial Intelligence “Twin” Technology Improves Remission Rates for T2D"
excerpt: "A wearable device powered by artificial intelligence and the Internet of Things to create a \"digital twin\" reduced glycated hemoglobin and improved remission rates for patients with type 2 diabetes (T2D) through personalized care."
